text: Tomaž Šalamun (July 4, 1941 – December 27, 2014) was a Slovenian poet. He was a leading name of postwar neo-avant-garde poetry in Central EuropeColm Tóibín (2004) The comet's trail, Guardian and internationally acclaimed absurdist.Martín López-Vega (2013)La poesía total de Tomaz Salamun, El Cultural Šalamun died on 27 December 2014 in Ljubljana, Slovenia, aged 73. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1941 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Slovenian poets Category:People from Zagreb
title: Tomaž Šalamun
